    • Method Detail

      • onTick

        public void onTick()
        Description copied from class: FlyingBlock
        This method gets called every tick and can be used to modify location and motion of this FlyingBlock. Please note these special cases:
        • In order to change the motion/velocity/direction, please use Entity.setVelocity(org.bukkit.util.Vector) if you are working with (Craft)Bukkit entities ( FlyingBlock.getBukkitEntity()), or modify the public fields motX, motY and motZ of FlyingBlock.getNMSEntity().
        • In order to change the location, please use FlyingBlock.setLocation(Location), or if you are using FlyingBlock.getNMSEntity(), either modify the public fields locX, locY and locZ, or use Entity.setPosition(double, double, double).
        Specified by:
        onTick in class FlyingBlock
